welcome: Hi, {first_name}! I'm a reminder bot. I'll help you not forget important things. To see available commands, use /help.
help_text: Available commands: /start - Start interacting with the bot /help - Show this message /set_reminder - Set a new reminder /list_reminders - Show your active reminders /change_language - Change language
empty_text_error: The reminder text cannot be empty. Please try again.
prompt_time: Now enter the reminder time in the format HH:MM (e.g., 14:30).
invalid_time_format: Invalid time format. Please please enter the time in the format HH:MM (e.g., 14:30).
reminder_done_response: Thank you, the reminder has been marked as done!
reminder_not_done_response: The reminder has been marked as not done.
